function.description: Enter your height in meters.
Enter your weight in kilograms.
The BMI is calculated using the formula weight (kg) / height (m)^2.
The calculated BMI is displayed on the page.
The page provides a classification of the BMI based on the World Health Organization's criteria.
Based on the calculated BMI, personalized advice is displayed regarding diet and exercise.
